nodes.text: Sith Lord and Korriban Sith Academy Headmaster Uthar Wynn constructed a double-bladed lightsaber while he was an apprentice under Jorak Uln.

In 3956 BBY, Wynn would use this lightsaber in a duel in the tomb of Naga Sadow against his apprentice Yuthura Ban who had plotted with former Dark Lord of the Sith and amnesic Revan to eliminate him. Wynn used this weapon for the final time in an attempt to kill his usurpers, but perished. The lightsaber was presumably left with his corpse.
